data.name: FLX001_Title
data.value: Fluxor component inheritance

data.name: FLX001_Description
data.value: Blazor component should inherit Fluxor component base

data.name: FLX001_Message
data.value: Component {0} should inherit {1}

data.name: FLX101_Title
data.value: Feature State should be decorated

data.name: FLX101_Description
data.value: Fluxor feature state should have FeatureStateAttribute

data.name: FLX101_Message
data.value: {0} is used as feature state, should be decorated with {1}

data.name: FLX102_Title
data.value: Feature state default constructor

data.name: FLX102_Description
data.value: Feature state object should have a default constructor (need not be public).

data.name: FLX102_Message
data.value: Feature State '{0}' missing default constructor

data.name: FLX200_Title
data.value: Effect method signature

data.name: FLX200_Description
data.value: Effect method should return a Task and take (optional) Action and IDispatcher arguments

data.name: FLX200_Message
data.value: Effect method {0} incorrect signature

data.name: FLX201_Title
data.value: Effect method return type

data.name: FLX201_Description
data.value: Effect methods should return Task

data.name: FLX201_Message
data.value: Effect method {0} should return Task

data.name: FLX202_Title
data.value: Effect method missing action

data.name: FLX202_Description
data.value: Effect method must either take action as argument, or declare action in the EffectsAttribute constructor.

data.name: FLX202_Message
data.value: Effect method {0} has not defined its action.

data.name: FLX203_Title
data.value: Effect method last argument should be IDispatcher

data.name: FLX203_Description
data.value: Effect methods should include a IDispatcher as last argument.

data.name: FLX203_Message
data.value: Effect method {0} last argument must be IDispatcher.

data.name: FLX204_Title
data.value: Effect method argument order

data.name: FLX204_Description
data.value: Effect methods should consume action as first parameter

data.name: FLX204_Message
data.value: Effect method {0} should consume action as first parameter, or declare action in EffectAttribute constructor

data.name: FLX300_Title
data.value: Reducer method signature

data.name: FLX300_Description
data.value: A Reducer should return updated ferature-state, take feature-state and (optional) action arguments.

data.name: FLX300_Message
data.value: Reducer method {0} incorrect signature

data.name: FLX301_Title
data.value: Reducer method missing action

data.name: FLX301_Description
data.value: A Reducer should either take a action as the last argument; or declare the action type in ReducerMethodAttribute constrcuctor.

data.name: FLX301_Message
data.value: Reducer method {0} should consume a action as last argument; or declare the action type in ReducerMethodAttribute constructor

data.name: FLX302_Title
data.value: Reducer methods must return a feature-state object.

data.name: FLX302_Description
data.value: Reducer methods must return a feature-state object.

data.name: FLX302_Message
data.value: Reducer method {0} is not returning a feature-state object.

data.name: FLX303_Title
data.value: Reducer method missing feature-state argument.

data.name: FLX303_Description
data.value: Reducer method must must consume the current feature-state as first argument.

data.name: FLX303_Message
data.value: Reducer method {0} should have {1} as first argument.

data.name: FLX304_Description
data.value: Reducer methods should be pure functions, best implemented as a static method.

data.name: FLX304_Message
data.value: Reducer method {0} should be a static pure function.

data.name: FLX304_Title
data.value: Reducer method should be static
